name: stuff-quiz
description: Calls a webhook with latest stuff quiz scraped from the quizzes page

scripts.zip-and-copy-to-update-bucket: npm run zip-code && npm run update-deployment-bucket
scripts.update-function-code: npm run zip-code && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name 'webservices-slack-app-dev-QuizScraperLambda-1POEX69FDXI3J' --zip-file fileb://deploy.zip --publish
scripts.update-function-code:post-handler: npm run zip-code && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name 'arn:aws:lambda:ap-southeast-2:454817366727:function:webservices-slack-app-dev-QuizPostHandlerLambda-1DC2E62X1D7DG' --zip-file fileb://deploy.zip --publish

author: Michael Lowe
